remarks: Lemma for the Axiom of Power Sets with no distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jan-2002.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Dec-2016.)
statement: axpowndlem4 $p |- ( -. A. y y = x -> ( -. A. y y = z -> ( -. x = y -> E. x A. y ( A. x ( E. z x e. y -> A. y x e. z ) -> y e. x ) ) ) ) $.
